channel.title: Recipe on Michaela Cheong
channel.description: Recent content in Recipe on Michaela Cheong

item.title: Mulberry jam
item.description: Variations From Claire K https://www.clairekcreations.com/mulberry-jam/ Claire’s Ingredients 500g fresh-picked, firm, ripe mulberries 500g sugar juice of 1/2 lemon Claire’s Instructions Pull all the stems of the fruits and put them into a large saucepan. Heat it over medium heat and crush the berries to squish out the juice. Bring it to a boil then add the sugar and lemon juice. Reduce the heat and stir the mixture until the sugar dissolves.

item.title: Banana pancakes
item.description: Related: Recipes https://www.taste.com.au/recipes/3-ingredient-banana-pancakes/6ozkpd8g 1 small ripe banana 1 medium egg 2 tbsp wholemeal self-raising flour oil spray

item.title: Claire Saffitz choc chip cookie
item.description: Related: Recipes https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kPauR6tP_cg 2 sticks unsalted butter (227g) 2 tbsp heavy cream (28g) 2 cups plain flour (all-purpose) (260g) 2 teaspoons diamond crystal kosher salt (6g) 1 tsp bicarbonate soda (baking soda) (6g) 3/4 cup packed dark brown sugar (150g) 3/4 cup caster sugar (granulated) (150g) 2 large eggs (100g), cold from fridge 1 tbsp vanilla extract (TABLE) 142g dark chocolate disks, half coarsely chopped 142g milk chocolate disks, half coarse oh chopped

item.title: Eggplant with garlic sauce
item.description: Related: Recipes Ingredients mostly of https://pickledplum.com/eggplant-garlic-sauce/ +mushroom, -chilli, +chilli flakes. one FAT western eggplant was more than enough. still have the seedy flesh from the middle. tried new fancy cooking wines and vinegars uwu. house smells nice. I didn’t have any chilli unfortunately but did chuck in some gratuitous chilli flakes at the eleventh hour Technique (sort of) from https://www.madewithlau.com/recipes/eggplant-with-garlic-sauce underestimated food prep time. my cooking skills are still very basic.

item.title: Jin doy (jian dui) (sesame balls red bean)
item.description: Related: Recipes tried in 2022 Rice flour (green writing) Red bean paste Toasted sesame seeds Sesame oil https://cookingwithdog.com/recipe/sesame-balls-goma-dango/ Oh! I think Aunty Elsa gave me tips the year I made the cha guo! (N.B. sweet cha guo with red bean seems to be a Hakka recipe https://bymargk.blogspot.com/2018/04/sweet-hakka-cha-guo-with-red-bean.html) Here’s what she wrote to me… Hi Julia I never made those but it’s same dough as Jin doys. Just have to use pink colouring roll into balls and fill with Do SAR (red bean sweet paste from a tin) or.

item.title: PICKLES
item.description: Related: Recipes https://lenaskitchenblog.com/vietnamese-quick-pickled-carrots-and-daikon/ 1 cup unseasoned rice vinegar ½ cup white vinegar 2 cups water ¼ cup sugar needs more sugar [[2022-09-09]] 2 ½ tbsp kosher salt WAY TOO MUCH SALT [[2022-09-08]] 3 medium carrots peeled and julienned 1 daikon peeled and julienned (about 8” inches long)

item.title: Roasted veggies
item.description: Related: Recipes Eggplant [[2022-08-09]] https://www.recipetineats.com/roasted-eggplant/ I did 200°C for 20min, flip, and then 10min. Canola oil and salt, on aluminium. Eggplant chunks surprisingly large going into the oven. Those bad boys SHRINK. Also, I put zucchini, which def needed to be smaller slices (lower moisture content?? but generally tougher flesh). Sweet potato and eggplant [[2022-09-13]] https://twokooksinthekitchen.com/roasted-sweet-potatoes-peppers-eggplant-apples/ sweet potato should be smaller maybe? nowhere near as brown as eggplant. 20 + 10min at 220C ish

item.title: Simple Korean Cucumber Salad (Oi Muchim 오이무침)
item.description: Related: Recipes https://kimchimari.com/korean-cucumber-salad/ very nice!! I still can’t find gochugaru and I’m crying. did the slinky from https://www.youtube.com/shorts/TNxgK3cebeU but abandoned it because it was a pretty bad slinky and also bad for storage and difficult to eat
